name: Saturday Scuba Sunshine Story
description:
You have a won a contest!

You don't remember entering, but you won anyway.

Your prize is a scuba diving adventure in a remote location, untouched by mankind.

After diving off the boat and seeing the beautiful fish, you return to the surface to find a tornado nearby and your boat gone.

A sign is posted on a nearby buoy: 

"Left to avoid tornado, back soon"

You must survive under the sea until the boat returns.

Game Controls

Press WASD to move your diver and your mouse to move your torch.

You will automatically aim your harpoon in the direction of your torch.

Right click to harpoon fish and pickups towards you as well as harpoon yourself towards cave walls.

Press F or Left Click to melee attack enemies.

You'll lose oxygen slowly over time, find oxygen canisters to top up!

Pick up health packs to restore health if you get attacked by an aggressive fish.

Good luck!
